heading: HR00364
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE PROVISION OF INTERPRETERS IN ALL JUDICIAL, QUASI-JUDICIAL AND INVESTIGATIVE PROCEEDINGS FOR VICTIMS AND ACCUSED PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES SUCH AS THE DEAF, MUTE AND BLIND
